name: YourDailyBible
0:
”Alexa, open your daily bible”
”Alexa, ask your daily bible for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start your daily bible”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: your daily bible
des: Listen to the latest podcast from Your Daily Bible. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
